verses.roman:
śivānanda kare sabāra ghāṭi samādhāna
sabāre pālana kare, deya vāsā-sthāna

synonyms: śivānanda—of the name Śivānanda; kare—does; sabāra—of everyone; ghāṭi—the camp; samādhāna—arrangement; sabāre—of everyone; pālana—maintenance; kare—performs; deya—gives; vāsā-sthāna—residential quarters.
translation: Śivānanda Sena arranged for the journey. He maintained everyone and provided residential quarters.
